amendment.description: Amendment increases the authorization for the character education program from $25 million to $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 107-69 increases the authorization for character education from $25 million to $50 million for fiscal year 2002 and such sums as may be necessary for each of fiscal years 2003 through 2006.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
